text: Ocean's Eight is a 2018 American heist comedy movie directed by Gary Ross. It is a spin-off from Steven Soderbergh's Ocean's series. It stars Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway, Mindy Kaling, Sarah Paulson, Awkwafina, Rihanna, and Helena Bonham Carter. It was released by Warner Bros. Pictures in the United States on June 8, 2018 to positive reviews. ==References== Category:2018 comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:American heist movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Gary Ross
title: Ocean's 8
